raw_body: MR H. L. PIYASENA. It is with deep sadness we announce the passing of Mr. Habarakada Liyanage Piyasena (Retired Chief Accountant), husband of late Chandra Ruberu, father of Ranjula, Chandima and Rasanga, father-in-law of Chandra, Dayantha and Prasad and grandfather of Nadil, Thenul, Ananya, Vivek and Diren.
